org.hibernate.search.backend.spi

Interface DeletionQuery

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SingularTermDeletionQuery

    public interface DeletionQuery
    interface for Serializable Queries that can be used to delete from an index. These have to be passed safely between VMs (we cannot rely on Lucene's queries here because of that).
    Author:
    Martin Braun
    Experimental

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getQueryKey()
      used to identify the type of query faster (no need for instanceof checks)
      String[] serialize()
      We are serializing to a String array here instead of a byte array since we don't want implementors to use the standard Java Serialization API by mistake
      Query toLuceneQuery(DocumentBuilderIndexedEntity documentBuilder)
      converts this DeletionQuery to a Lucene Query

    • Method Detail

      • getQueryKey

        int getQueryKey()
        used to identify the type of query faster (no need for instanceof checks)
        Returns:
        the unique query key

      • toLuceneQuery

        Query toLuceneQuery(DocumentBuilderIndexedEntity documentBuilder)
        converts this DeletionQuery to a Lucene Query
        Parameters:
        documentBuilder - the document builder of this entity
        Returns:
        the deletion query as Lucene Query

      • serialize

        String[] serialize()
        We are serializing to a String array here instead of a byte array since we don't want implementors to use the standard Java Serialization API by mistake
        Returns:
        a String[] representation of this DeletionQuery
